definition[0]: when a group of people all want to do the same thing at the same time
example[0]: a stampede to buy shares in high-tech companies
definition[1]: when a group of large animals or people suddenly start running in the same direction because they are frightened or excited
definition[2]: if a group of large animals or people stampede, they suddenly start running together in the same direction because they are frightened or excited
example[3]: Children came stampeding out of the school doors.
